title: User Account - New Laptop Deployment
description: A user's old laptop has failed and a new one needs to be deployed to them.

tasks.description: Take a new laptop from stock and deploy the standard corporate operating system image to it.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new laptop is set up with the base OS and software.

tasks.description: Run a data transfer tool to copy the user's profile and data from their old hard drive (or backup) to the new laptop.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user's data is successfully migrated to the new machine.

tasks.description: Arrange for the new laptop to be shipped to the user and the old one to be returned for secure disposal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user receives their new, fully configured laptop.
